Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets. MIT Licensed.

Name: dhcp6
Description: Package dhcp6 implements a DHCPv6 server, as described in RFC 3315. MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: xdp
Description: Package xdp provides access to Linux userspace XDP sockets (AF_XDP). MIT Licensed.

Name: ndp
Description: Package ndp implements the Neighbor Discovery Protocol, as described in RFC 4861.  MIT Licensed.

Name: talks
Description: Talks by Matt Layher.  MIT Licensed.

Name: apcupsd
Description: Package apcupsd provides a client for the apcupsd Network Information Server (NIS).  MIT Licensed.

Name: wireguardctrl
Description: Package wireguardctrl enables control of WireGuard devices on multiple platforms. MIT Licensed.

Name: wifi
Description: Package wifi provides access to IEEE 802.11 WiFi device actions and statistics.  MIT Licensed.

Name: kobject
Description: Package kobject provides access to Linux kobject userspace events. MIT Licensed.
